SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_QUOTAVARIANCE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Determine how many kids can be registered for a project based on the currently registered kids and the current quota
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: BETHESDA\cmayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_QUOTAVARIANCE(@CHILDPROJECTID uniqueidentifier) returns smallint with execute as caller as begin
return dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECTCURRENTQUOTA(@CHILDPROJECTID) - dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_REGISTEREDCHILDCOUNT(@CHILDPROJECTID) end
